import React, { useState } from "react" import * as serviceProduct from "../../service/ServiceProduct"; import {Field, Form, Formik} from "formik"; const ShopCart = ({ shopItems, addToCart }) => { const [count, setCount] = useState(0) const increment = () => { setCount(count + 1) } return ( <> {shopItems.map((shopItems, index) => { return (
{shopItems.quantity}% Off

{shopItems.nameRacing}

{shopItems.price}

) })} ) } export default ShopCart
